import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Deactivate a survey"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/surveys/{SurveyId}/deactivate"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Deactivates a survey and its linked business rules, stopping new assignments.

**Prerequisites**
1. **SurveyId** - Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) to find the survey. Extract `Item[].SurveyId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Find survey: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys](/docs/api/surveys/get-surveys) -&gt; extract `SurveyId`
2. Deactivate: GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/deactivate
3. Verify status: [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}](/docs/api/surveys/get-survey) -&gt; check `IsActive = false`

**Effects**:
- Sets `IsActive = false` on the survey
- Deactivates all linked business rules
- No new survey assignments will occur
- Existing pending surveys can still be completed

**Notes**: Use [GET /api/v1.0/surveys/\{SurveyId\}/activate](/docs/api/surveys/activate-survey) to resume survey assignments.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"SurveyId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"},"description":"Unique identifier of the survey to deactivate."}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
